title: Why havent I gotten chest?
body: Hey I haven't gotten a chest in months I actually have 28 key fragments because I am waiting for chest. Now I have gotten S ranks on games so I'm just curious why I haven't got any?

replies.body: There are a few requirements to get mastery chests, per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Make sure that you own the champion you're getting a chest from, and that you haven't already earned a chest with that champ this season already.  Let me know if that clears things up!
